text: Peppermint is a 2018 American Hong Kong action thriller movie directed by Pierre Morel and starring Jennifer Garner, John Ortiz, Tyson Ritter, John Gallagher Jr., Juan Pablo Raba, Annie Ilonzeh, Jeff Hephner, Pell James, Cailey Fleming. ==Other websites== * Category:2018 action movies Category:2018 thriller movies Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Pierre Morel
title: Peppermint (2018 movie)
